topic.title: What is Google Gemini?
topic.shortdesc: Google Gemini is as a public, generative AI tool that allows you to get full-text, conversational responses to your questions.

body.p: Google Gemini is an artificial intelligence chatbot that can respond to a user's questions (or prompts) on any subject with an almost human-like "understanding." It performs text-based tasks like creating various forms of content, summarizing text, and translating between languages.
